attacks.name: Darkness Roar
attacks.text: You may have your opponent switch the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sleep Hole
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is Asleep, this attack does 40 damage plus 40 more damage. If the Defending Pokémon is not Asleep, that Pokémon is now Asleep.

ability.name: Wild Growth
ability.text: Each basic Grass Energy card attached to your Grass Pokémon provides Grass Grass Energy instead. You can't use more than 1 Wild Growth Poké-Body each turn.

attacks.name: Leaf Blade
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage.

ability.name: Wash Out
ability.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Water or Fighting Energy attached to 1 of your Benched Pokémon to your Active Pokémon. This power can't be used if Swampert is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Hammer Arm
attacks.text: Discard the top card from your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Band Attack
attacks.text: Does 30 damage times the number of Beedrill you have in play.

attacks.name: Twineedle
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Time Bellow
attacks.text: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Flash Cannon
attacks.text: You may return all Energy cards attached to Dialga to your hand. If you do, remove the highest Stage Evolution card from the Defending Pokémon and shuffle that card into your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Miraculous Light
attacks.text: Remove 2 damage counters and all Special Conditions from Latias.

attacks.name: Mist Ball
attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy and a Water Energy attached to Latias.

attacks.name: Spacial Rend
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Stadium card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. If there is any Stadium card in play, discard it.

attacks.name: Transback
attacks.text: You may flip a coin. If heads, discard all Energy attached to Palkia and put the Defending Pokémon and all cards attached to it on top of your opponent's deck. Your opponent shuffles his or her deck afterward.

ability.name: HEAL
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have Unown H, Unown E, Unown A, and Unown L on your Bench, you may remove all Special Conditions from 1 of your Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hidden Power
attacks.text: Discard a card from your hand. (If you can't discard a card from your hand, this attack does nothing.)

attacks.name: Present
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for any 1 card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

ability.name: Download
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Supporter card from your hand and use the effect of that card as the effect of this power. This power can't be used if Porygon2 is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Swagger
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Sweet Kiss
attacks.text: Your opponent may draw a card.

attacks.name: Clamp
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Super Speed
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Swablu during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Shoot Through
attacks.text: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Yawn
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Find a friend
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokémon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Dialga

ability.name: Time Skip
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may have your opponent flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, your turn ends. If both of them are tails, after your opponent draws a card at the beginning of his or her next turn, his or her turn ends. This power can't be used if Dialga is affected by a Special Condition.

text: Put this card onto your Active Dialga. Dialga LV. X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.

attacks.name: Metal Flash
attacks.text: During your next turn, Dialga can't use Metal Flash.

attacks.name: Moon Twinkle
attacks.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, remove 2 damage counters from Cresselia.

attacks.name: Lunar Dance
attacks.text: You may discard 2 Energy attached to Cresselia. If you do, remove all damage counters from 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Astonish
attacks.text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking. Look at that card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.

attacks.name: Telebeam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Parallel Drain
attacks.text: After your attack, remove from 1 of your Pokémon the number of damage counters equal to the damage you did to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dozing Scales
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep. If tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

ability.name: Anger Point
ability.text: If Primeape has any damage counters on it, Primeape's attacks do 40 more damage to the Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Whump
attacks.text: Primeape is now Confused. Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Carry In
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Pokémon Tool card, a Supporter card, and a basic Energy card, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

ability.name: Trump Card
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out during your opponent's last turn, search your deck for any 1 card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Slowking is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Psych Up
attacks.text: During your next turn, Slowking's Psych Up attack's base damage is 60.

ability.name: Good Night Melody
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Each Active Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) is now Asleep. This power can't be used if Wigglytuff is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Balloon Attack
attacks.text: If Igglybuff is anywhere under Wigglytuff, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Scary Face
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon can't attack or retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Threaten and Drop
attacks.text: If Huntail has any Darkness Energy attached to it, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage and discard a Special Energy card, if any, attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Guzzle
attacks.text: Choose up to 2 basic Water Energy cards from your hand and attach them to Pelipper. Remove 2 damage counters for each Energy card attached in this way.

attacks.name: Jet Return
attacks.text: Does 30 damage times the number of Energy cards attached to Pelipper. Then, put all Energy cards attached to Pelipper on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Primal Calling
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 Trainer cards that have Fossil in their names, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Sleep Swirl
attacks.text: Both Relicanth and the Defending Pokémon are now Asleep.

ability.name: FAKE
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Unown F is on your Bench, you may use this power. Put a coin next to your Active Pokémon without showing your opponent and cover it with your hand. Your opponent guesses if the coin is heads or tails. If he or she is wrong, draw a card.

attacks.name: Hidden Power
attacks.text: You may flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, this attack's base damage is 30.

ability.name: Pupate
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Caterpie is your Active Pokémon, you may flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a card that evolves from Caterpie and put it onto Caterpie. (This counts as evolving Caterpie.) Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Caterpie is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Shed Skin
attacks.text: Remove 2 damage counters from Ekans.

attacks.name: Poison Fang
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Rage
attacks.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Mankey.

attacks.name: Endeavor
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Vine Invite
attacks.text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with 1 of the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Grass Knot
attacks.text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Colorless Energy in the Defending Pokémon's Retreat Cost (after applying effects to the Retreat Cost).

ability.name: Sunlight
ability.text: If you have Lunatone in play, damage done to your opponent's Pokémon by your Psychic or Fighting Pokémon isn't affected by Resistance.

attacks.name: Sol Charge
attacks.text: Search your discard pile for a basic Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Energy Ball
attacks.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Treecko but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.

attacks.name: Absorb
attacks.text: Remove 1 damage counter from Treecko.

attacks.name: Pull Out
attacks.text: Search your discard pile for any 1 card, show it to your opponent, and put it on top of your deck.

attacks.name: Double Stab
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

cards.name: Moonlight Stadium
text: This card stays in play when you play it. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. If another card with the same name is in play, you can't play this card.
The Retreat Cost for each Psychic and Darkness Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) is 0.

cards.name: Premier Ball
text: Search your deck or your discard pile for a Pokémon LV. X, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. If you search your deck, shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Rare Candy
text: Choose 1 of your Basic Pokémon in play. If you have a Stage 1 or Stage 2 card that evolves from that Pokémon in your hand, put that card on the Basic Pokémon. (This counts as evolving that Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Reach Over
attacks.text: Search your deck for an Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Darkness Pursuit
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is Cresselia, this attack's base damage is 100.

attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is Asleep, move all damage counters from Hypno to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hypnoblast
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

ability.name: Marvel Scale
ability.text: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Milotic by your opponent's Pokémon LV.X.

attacks.name: Twister
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If both are tails, this attack does nothing. For each heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dark Fang
attacks.text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking and discard it.

attacks.name: Black Fire
attacks.text: You may discard a Fire or Darkness Energy attached to Houndoom. If you discard a Fire Energy, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned. If you discard a Darkness Energy, this attack does 40 damage plus 30 more damage.

cards.name: Felicity's Drawing
text: You can play only one Supporter card each turn. When you play this card, put it next to your Active Pokémon. When your turn ends, discard this card.
Discard up to 2 cards from your hand. If you discard 1 card, draw 3 cards. If you discard 2 cards, draw 4 cards.

attacks.name: Greenness
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Grass Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Poison Breath
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon's attacks. That Pokémon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Cutting Claw
attacks.text: If your opponent has Seviper in play, this attack does 40 damage plus 50 more damage.

attacks.name: Captivate
attacks.text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with 1 of the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Ember
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy attached to Houndour.

ability.name: Baby Evolution
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Jigglypuff from your hand onto Igglybuff (this counts as evolving Igglybuff) and remove all damage counters from Igglybuff.

attacks.name: Inquire
attacks.text: Draw a card. If you didn't play any Supporter card from your hand during this turn, draw 2 more cards.

ability.name: Gravity Change
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a card from your hand. Then, if you have Solrock in play, draw a card. This power can't be used if Lunatone is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Knock Over
attacks.text: You may discard any Stadium card in play.

attacks.name: Rendezvous
attacks.text: Reveal the top card of your deck and put it into your hand. If that card is a Pokémon, draw 2 cards.

attacks.text: If Luvdisc and the Defending Pokémon have the same amount of Energy attached to them, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Arm Thrust
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Roar
attacks.text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

cards.name: Leftovers
text: Attach Leftovers to 1 of your Pokémon that doesn't already have a Pokémon Tool attached to it. If that Pokémon is Knocked Out, discard this card.
If the Pokémon Leftovers is attached to is your Active Pokémon at the end of your turn, remove 1 damage counter from that Pokémon.

ability.name: Light Conduct
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have Illumise in play, you may search your discard pile for a Supporter card, show it to your opponent, and put it on top of your deck. This power can't be used if Volbeat is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Firefly Light
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: String Shot
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Fire Dance
attacks.text: Search your discard pile for a Fire Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flame Kick
attacks.text: Discard 2 Fire Energy attached to Blaziken. This attack does 80 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 Basic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Smash Short
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool card attached to it, this attack does 10 damage plus 30 more damage. Discard that Pokémon Tool card, look at your opponent's hand, and discard any Pokémon Tool cards of the same name you find there.

ability.name: Conversion
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a basic Energy card from your hand. Porygon-Z is the same type as that Energy card until the end of your turn. This power can't be used if Porygon-Z is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Tri Attack
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Power Whip
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage for each basic Energy card attached to Tangrowth to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Stick and Absorb
attacks.text: Remove 3 damage counters from Tangrowth. The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

ability.name: Serene Grace
ability.text: Once during your turn, when you play Togekiss from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may look at the top 10 cards of your deck, choose as many basic Energy cards as you like, and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Put the other cards back on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Air Scroll
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 30 more damage. If tails, remove 3 damage counters from Togekiss.

attacks.name: Dragonbreath
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Cotton Cloud
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Altaria by attacks from your opponent's Evolved Pokémon is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

ability.name: Cosmic Power
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may choose up to 2 cards from your hand and put them on the bottom of your deck in any order. If you do, draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand. This power can't be used if Claydol is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Ambient Noise
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If the first coin is heads, this attack does 50 damage to the Defending Pokémon. If the first coin is tails, this attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) If the second coin is heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused. If the second coin is tails, your opponent can't play any Trainer, Supporter, or Stadium cards from his or her hand during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Scissor Blow
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon would be Knocked Out by this attack, Kingler does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Energy Draw
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a basic Energy card and attach it to Latios. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Luster Purge
attacks.text: Discard 3 Energy attached to Latios.

attacks.name: Pick Out
attacks.text: Choose 1 face-down Prize card (yours or your opponent's) and put it face up. If that card is a Supporter card, use the effect of that card as the effect of this attack. (That card remains face up for the rest of the game.)

attacks.name: Jaw Bite
attacks.text: During your next turn, if an attack does damage to the Defending Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance), that attack does 20 more damage.

ability.name: Toxic Virus
ability.text: At any time between turns, each player puts 1 more damage counter on his or her Poisoned Pokémon.

attacks.name: Offensive Gas
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Deadly Poison
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 10 damage plus 40 more damage. If the Defending Pokémon is not Poisoned, that Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Floatzel during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with 1 of the Defending Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to the new Defending Pokémon.

attacks.text: If Gorebyss has any Psychic Energy attached to it, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Daunt
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Rage
attacks.text: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Granbull.

attacks.name: Palm Strike
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Spirited Throw
attacks.text: If Hariyama has fewer remaining HP than the Defending Pokémon, this attack's base damage is 80.

attacks.name: Switcheroo
attacks.text: Move a Pokémon Tool card attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon to another of your opponent's Pokémon (excluding Pokémon that already has a Pokémon Tool attached to it). (If an effect of this attack is prevented, this attack does nothing.)

attacks.name: Overrun
attacks.text: Does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Bass Control
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Muddy Bomb
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon and 10 damage to each of your opponent's other Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

ability.name: Emerge
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Metapod is your Active Pokémon, you may flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a card that evolves from Metapod and put it onto Metapod. (This counts as evolving Metapod.) Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Metapod is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Skarmory by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

As long as Unown G is attached to a Pokémon, prevent all effects of attacks, excluding damage, done to that Pokémon.

attacks.text: If Unown G has any damage counters on it, this attack's base damage is 10.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Psychic Balance
attacks.text: If you have less cards in your hand than your opponent, draw cards until you have the same number of cards as your opponent. (If you have more or the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, this attack does nothing.)

attacks.text: Switch Baltoy with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.text: Search your deck for an Evolution card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Body Slam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

You can't use more than 1 Dark Shadow Poké-Body each turn.

text: Put this card onto your Active Darkrai. Darkrai LV. X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.

ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may have your opponent switch 1 of your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. text: Put this card onto your Active Palkia. Palkia LV. X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.

attacks.text: You may move all Energy cards attached to Palkia to your Benched Pokémon in any way you like. (Ignore this effect if you don't have any Benched Pokémon.)

ability.name: Sleeping Pulse
